title: [極重要] 唔太熟英文嘅人全部同我入黎，機場有好多外國記者訪問你地，學下點用簡單英文答，做好對外文宣

replies.msg:
係機場見到好多外國記者會係咁訪問我地，但呢兩日見大家答到口啞啞，未必識得用英文形容今次件事係點，所以呢到會用簡單英文介紹下五大訴求、黑警呢啲野可以點講。
本人只係一個大學雞，讀過下書盡量用簡單英文幫手譯下

好多時外國記者都想知你黎機場目的係咩，發生咩事，其實更加多鬼佬唔知發生咩事。呢啲英文應該可以答到佢地香港發生咩事


五大訴求 Five Major Demands
1. 撤回 Withdrawal of the Extradition Bill
2. 收回暴動定性 Retract "Riot" characterization of all protests
3. 獨立調查委員會 independent commission of inquiry regarding police brutality
4. 雙普選 dual universal suffrage
5. 釋放被捕義士 amnesty for all arrested protesters

黑警 Riot Police
1. 射眼 A female first aider was headshot causing permanent blindness
2. 行刑式掃射撤退示威者 Police strafed或者fired rubber bullet at retreating protesters at less than 2m inside Taikoo mtr station
3. 扮示威者 evidence that police pretended and dressed like protesters
4. 室內催淚彈 police fired tear gas into indoor MTR station
5. 警黑合作，冇白衫比人拉 police-triad cooperation behind 21/7 terrorist attack in yuen long mtr station, where no one is yet charged

小弟而家係機場冇咩圖輔助，暫時諗到咁多，記者問到你就咁答就OK，有補充有錯請指正
推推推推推推推推推推推推
推推推推推推推推推推
推推推推推推

Riot police 係解防暴警察
黑警可以用 riotous police

推推推推推推

推比大家睇，要用果陣對住個POST讀曬出黎

replies.msg:
Riot police , point 2. 講返pepper ball gun，唔係rubber bullet, 一陣又話我地屈9佢地
我地唔係d 狗咁低裝

小意見，譯生字唔夠。
以下係我嘅建議答案，冇咁多生字，記者同讀者唔洗做太多research都明。尤其universal sufferage你求其捉個native speaker問佢都唔會識。
Q: What are you doing here?
A: Basically Hong Kong is losing its freedom and falling into a dictatorship regime and we wanna fight back. Here we are very peaceful letting the world know about us but then the government decided to close down the airport and blame us for causing such trouble for those who’re visiting Hong Kong.
Q: What do you guys want?
A: Our demands were repeatedly ignored by the government. We want an official withdrawal of the China extradition bill because we have no faith in the so called legal system of China. And the issue of police brutality where they have been acting like terrorists and attacking everyone not just the protestors. They have been bombing tear gas in residential areas and even a metro station. So it’s just the Nazi gas chamber all over again (大部份讀西史都會讀過呢段). Obviously the government has given up ruling and we are under an anarchic state. And most of all we want to true democracy and definitely not the Chinese way.

replies.msg:
讀script 會好肉酸
仲會可能令人覺得呢個唔係受訪者本人嘅見解
為咗香港，大家溫溫英文
試下可唔可以學識咗啲生字之後搭simple English表達番自己對現況嘅不滿同訴求出嚟
推

Just a simple example:
We are ordinary citizens of Hong Kong who have been promised a high degree of autonomy and freedom of speech, gathering as well as democracy under the Basic Law and the Joint Declaration signed by UK and China.
However, China has reneged on its promise since 1997 and bit by bit our freedom and quality of life has been eroded under measures taken by the China appointed Chief Executive. We have no faith in the Chinese legal system or their human rights records and the Extradition Law was the last straw!
We want the Government to recognise and respect the One Country Two System policy, and stop stonewalling us in such high handed fashion.
The Government have totally ignored our repeated pleas and authorised the Police to clamp down on our protests by using excessive force, dirty tricks, triad gangs, unlawful arrests and malicious/political prosecutions, to say the least.
Everyone in society including politicians, lawyers, professionals, entrepreneurs have called for an Independent Enquiry but so far all these pleas have fallen on deaf ear.
We just want our Government to get off its high horse, to listen to us and act with conscience and the best interests of Hong Kong at heart.
We would appreciate your support. Thank you.
